text:
Created attachment 1799
Fix for this bug, in jasper, first iteration
creator: edburns@acm.org
edburns@acm.org
text:
Additionally, I'm happy to report that this bug does not manifest itself in 
Jasper 2.

Err, I think this is still the case in Tomcat 4.1.12. It does not evaluate
expressions in jsp params, such as:

<jsp:param name="ccc" value="<%=1+2%>" />

Ends up as:

<param name="ccc" value=1+2>

Not very helpful!
creator: jbaker@teamenergy.com

text:
The value attribute for jsp:param expects a String, so the expression has to
evaluate to a String, otherwise funning things may happen.
creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
